translations: 矮人；侏儒；俾格米人；微不足道的东西/人
矮小的；微少的；无足轻重的

sentences.sentence: "Hear me, O men, " cried Diogenes, in the market place at Athens; and, when a crowd collected around him, he said scornfully, "I called for men, not pigmies. "
sentences.translation: “哎，大家，听我说，”第欧根尼在雅典的市场喊道；随后人群聚拢过来，他轻蔑地说：“我呼唤的是人，而不是侏儒。”
